title: OctetStringGetFromPointNum (Method)
text:
METHOD OctetStringGetFromPointNum :
Error
Get the value of Octet String datapoint (DNP3 object group 110 âoctet stringsâ) with given point number (0 .. MaxPointNum).
Returns PointNotExistent, if a datapoint with the given point number doesnt exist, OK otherwise.
The caller has to provide a buffer where to store the Octet String value.
Eventually the Octet value exceeds the provided buffer, in this case Error.NoMemory will be returned,
nevertheless the first maxLenStrBuf bytes of value are copied to pStrBuf.

rows: Pointer to buffer where to store the Octet String value
Maximum number of bytes to store in pStrBuf
